name: Chrome RDP: Padding Be Damned
description: For Chrome Remote Desktop: The amount of padding Google has arbitrarily shoved on this list of desktops is nauseating. Even if you were on a touchscreen, you'd have to be a power-puff girl or a Muppet to require as much padding as Google has used here. This fixes that.
additional_info:
v1.0.2, 3.21.2018 Release
--------
Now applies to variations of the URL (when using multiple users in Chrome, the address would change based on which user you were logged in with).

v1.0.1, 3.21.2018 Release
--------
Adjusted more to help make it look nicer.

v1.0.0, 3.20.2018 Release
---------
This applies to the https://remotedesktop.google.com/access page (the one that lists all your desktops).
